title: What is the "critically close to demotion" threshold?
body: Is there some rough estimate of games lost in a row, from the very first time you see the red badge denoting that you're critically close to demotion, that you can expect to demote to a lower tier?

replies.body: There isn't an exact number for when you'll be demoted, it's just that losing enough games at 0 LP with eventually cause you to demote. Be sure to check out the [**ranked guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q2) for those small details.
